dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4332375V] Re: copyright sharing of products
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2007 9:18 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4332375V] Re: copyright sharing of products ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Re: copyright sharing of products Added by system at Wednesday, May 30 2007 02:00 pm X-MailFrom: c_bush@telus.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed, 30 May 2007 13:58:38 -0500 Received: from priv-edtnaa06.telusplanet.net ([206.75.57.251]) by priv-edtnes87.telusplanet.net (InterMail vM.7.08.02.00 201-2186-121-20061213) with ESMTP id <20070530185835.VJGD27858.priv-edtnes87.telusplanet.net@priv-edtnaa06.te lusplanet.net> for ; Wed, 30 May 2007 12:58:35 -0600 Received: from Cynthia-Rae (d206-75-57-251.abhsia.telus.net [206.75.57.251]) by priv-edtnaa06.telusplanet.net (BorderWare MXtreme Infinity Mail Firewall) with SMTP id FAEANNSP2K for ; Wed, 30 May 2007 12:58:34 -0600 (MDT) MIME-Version: 1.0 Message-Id: <465DC958.00000E.00644@CYNTHIA-RAE> Date: Wed, 30 May 2007 12:58:32 -0600 (Mountain Daylight Time) Content-Type: Multipart/Alternative; charset="iso-8859-1"; boundary="------------Boundary-00=_KDBVXFP0000000000000" X-Mailer: IncrediMail (5502981) From: "~Cynthia-Rae~" X-FID: FLAVOR00-NONE-0000-0000-000000000000 X-Priority: 2 To: Subject: Re: copyright sharing of products Disposition-Notification-To: "~Cynthia-Rae~" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of telus.net designates 199.185.220.240 as permitted sender) client-ip=199.185.220.240; envelope-from=c_bush@telus.net; helo=defout.telus.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 30 May 2007 18:58:47.0500 (UTC) FILETIME=[8D99D8C0:01C7A2EC] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello .... I was directed to you through bravenet as they say you are hosting a website that is sharing illegal copyrighted material. This is a copy of the email I received from them as to why I am contacting you about it now. Help Ticket #:2737150B8E15Priority: Normal Name:Cynthia-Rae Category:Support Email Address:tx_angel_for_you@yahoo.com Last Post:May 30, 2007 03:19:50 Opened:May 29, 2007 07:57:10 Bravenet Username: Password: Website URL: Problem URL:http://67.18.219.83/image_hosting/web_pages/NewBees/ Add to this Ticket Ticket Status: Assigned to: Coal Bravenet Web Services Support [Coal - Support Night Manager]May 30, 2007 03:19:50 Was this reply helpful? Dear Cynthia-are, Unfortunately this website is not hosted through Bravenet. The IP whois information is below: OrgName: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. OrgID: TPCM Address: 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Address: Suite 110 City: Dallas StateProv: TX PostalCode: 75207 Country: US ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321 NetRange: 67.18.0.0 - 67.19.255.255 CIDR: 67.18.0.0/15 NetName: NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-11 NetHandle: NET-67-18-0-0-1 Parent: NET-67-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM Comment: RegDate: 2004-03-15 Updated: 2004-07-29 RTechHandle: PP46-ARIN RTechName: Pathos, Peter RTechPhone: +1-214-782-7800 RTechEmail: admins@theplanet.com OrgAbuseHandle: ABUSE271-ARIN OrgAbuseName: Abuse OrgAbusePhone: +1-214-782-7802 OrgAbuseEmail: abuse@theplanet.com OrgNOCHandle: TECHN33-ARIN OrgNOCName: Technical Support OrgNOCPhone: +1-214-782-7800 OrgNOCEmail: admins@theplanet.com OrgTechHandle: TECHN33-ARIN OrgTechName: Technical Support OrgTechPhone: +1-214-782-7800 OrgTechEmail: admins@theplanet.com # ARIN WHOIS database, last updated 2007-05-29 19:10 # Enter ? For additional hints on searching ARIN's WHOIS database. Member [Cynthia-Rae]May 29, 2007 07:57:10 This group is in copyright infringement..... They have on their site and a extensive list of serial numbers for many copyright programs ..http://67.18 219.83/image_hosting/web_pages/NewBees/PlugInCodes.HTML Not only that they are sharing copyright programs in zip files to download with the tutorials they are sharing. Then on top of that the tutorials they share for the bees are not theirs to share. They have taken tutorials from another lady who has not given them permission and is using them in their group. Posted From: http://www.bravenet.com/global/abuse.php This is why I am contacting you on this matter. What can be done about this and what are you as the hosting company going to do about the fact of them sharing illegal items. I have reported this matter to Alienskin manufacturing as well. Since one of the zip files contains software that is not freeware from that company. I hope to hear from you soon regarding this matter. Sincerely; Cynthia-Rae MIME element (text/html)

Member [Cynthia-Rae] May 29, 2007 07:57:10
This group is in copyright infringement..... They have on their site and a extensive list of serial numbers for many copyright programs ..http://67.18.219.83/image_hosting/web_pages/NewBees/PlugInCodes.HTML
Not only that they are sharing copyright programs in zip files to download with the tutorials they are sharing.

Then on top of that the tutorials they share for the bees are not theirs to share. They have taken tutorials from another lady who has not given them permission and is using them in their group.



Posted From: http://www.bravenet.com/global/abuse.php

 This is why I am contacting you on this matter. What can be done about this and what are you as the hosting company going to do about the fact of them sharing illegal items. I have reported this matter to Alienskin manufacturing as well. Since one of the zip files contains software  that is not freeware from that company. I hope to hear from you soon regarding this matter.
 
Sincerely;
Cynthia-Rae
